Uses of Class
monero.common.MoneroConnectionManager

  • Packages that use MoneroConnectionManager 
    Package Description
    monero.common  

    • Uses of MoneroConnectionManager in monero.common

      Methods in monero.common that return MoneroConnectionManager 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.addConnection​(MoneroRpcConnection connection)
      Add a connection.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.addListener​(MoneroConnectionManagerListener listener)
      Add a listener to receive notifications when the connection changes.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.checkConnection()
      Check the current connection.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.checkConnections()
      Check all managed connections.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.clear()
      Remove all connections.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.disconnect()
      Disconnect from the current connection.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.removeConnection​(java.lang.String uri)
      Remove a connection.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.removeListener​(MoneroConnectionManagerListener listener)
      Remove a listener.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.removeListeners()
      Remove all listeners.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.reset()
      Reset to default state.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.setAutoSwitch​(boolean autoSwitch)
      Automatically switch to best available connection if current connection is disconnected after being checked.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.setConnection​(java.lang.String uri)
      Set the current connection without changing the credentials.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.setConnection​(MoneroRpcConnection connection)
      Set the current connection.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.setTimeout​(long timeoutInMs)
      Set the maximum request time before a connection is considered offline.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.startCheckingConnection()
      Check the connection and start checking the connection periodically.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.startCheckingConnection​(java.lang.Long periodMs)
      Check the connection and start checking the connection periodically.
      MoneroConnectionManager MoneroConnectionManager.stopCheckingConnection()
      Stop checking the connection status periodically.
